alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 3:49AM EST until December 23 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...In New York, Western Essex County. In Vermont, Eastern Addison, Eastern Rutland and Western Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 4 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy wet snow could lead to power outages, especially above 1500 ft.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Rutland; Western Windsor
